text: Ana khaŋ muuŋgi. Mba Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui Zudaiŋ gumgi mbari, mbe Zems han kegap, zergi fhuvara. Mbe mbur kim, Pita harigi fhaiŋ ŋgui gumgi, mbe guigira Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui, ana mbe phorga pav ki. Ana mbe phorga pav kim, mba guigira Zisas khothɨgap ana zɨn vui Zudaiŋ, mbe Zems han kegap, zav hegim, Pita mben rivgi. Mbe khaŋ tɨga havhargiap fooi tɨva zɨn vui ntɨɨri ma. Ana maaŋ muuŋgiap, mba harigi fhaiŋ ŋgui gumgi thav, samra kav, ana wom khurkhuman mbe khuui fhu.
